attributes.action: Bring back galaxy truffles in Celebrations
attributes.additional_details:
The BEST bit of any tub/tin of Celebrations has been thrown our for a poor replacement (in comparison), the Twix.

I make the motion of correcting this grave error of judgement and return the only reason people give Celebrations at Christmas time.

Return the Galaxy truffle!

rejection.details: Unfortunately this is not the responsibility of the Government.
